name: It's bean a long time
description:
This book is an homage to video games, the very things that inspired me as a young illustrator. I decided I wanted to make a book, I took to Kickstarter and the project was funded, this is the result:

A finely crafted, 218 page, a5 illustrated perfect bound book will be delivered direct to your address. It holds 100 richly detailed caricatures and their corresponding illustrated logos across all pages. All inspired by four decades of video games.

Now quickly, watch this video for clarity on what the EvilHairDay book can do for you: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/TRmHw7E4i7k?rel=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

They are limited to exactly 100 copies, so get yours before they all fly off the shelves.

name: special bean caricature
description:
Have you ever wondered what you would look like as a bean? Wonder no more! This is the product for you, perhaps you want a picture of your favourite comic book character, or a portrait for the whole family in bean form.
For just £8 a caricature, you can have your very own bean. It will be digitally shipped straight to your computer so you can do with it what you will, no need for those pesky shipping costs. 
So I don't really know why you are still here reading this, order and then email the picture you want a bean caricature of to : order@evilhairday.co.uk

name: tailor made t shirt
description:
I wanted to be able to make t shirts for people so they could have their own ideas immortalised in my style thought of by them. If you want an entirely original design, tailor made, then this is the one to pick.

There are a few examples of designs that have been commissioned in the product view - enjoy.  

N.B. If you have a thought of what design you want, before you order, check by the brain book at www.EvilHairDay.co.uk/portfolio and see if it already exists and we can print it straight up for you, and you will get it even sooner!

Step 1. Buy this tee.

Step 2. When buying make sure you email all the specifics of what design you would like created, be as descriptive as you want. (email to: order@evilhairday.co.uk)

Step 3. Wait eagerly for the delivery of your item.

Step 4. Watch this video for clarity: <iframe width="256" height="144" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/JVG9PxmV_Us?rel=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Designs are printed on 100% polyester white t shirts from the amazing american apparel. Ultra comfortable and suitable to wear with, well anything.

Please check sizes carefully before ordering : 
Small - chest (inches) 34-36 waist (inches) 30-32 
Medium - chest (inches) 38-40 waist (inches) 32-33 
Large - chest (inches) 42-44 waist (inches) 33-34

Everyones favourite bean, travelling through time and space. Show your love for every single regeneration of the classic character with this special a3 poster.

description:
If you are looking at this product you are more than definitely the type of person to own this piece.
A colourful a3 poster with lots of caricatures on it. Get the girl (interested) with this beauty.

description:
For those of you with a love for the comic book universe, this one is for you. The beanvengers are here to save the world, honour the dysfunctional mayhem of the awesome group by brandishing your wall with this tailor designed a3 poster for your wall.

name: Bean Comics #1
description:
Everyone loves retro right? Yeah retro is totally hot right now, retro. Speaking of retro, this fantastic a3 size poster? Totally retro, totally awesome, totally what you need in your life.

name: The Uncanny B-MEN
description:
An alternate universe, gruff looking characters, superheroes either dead or missing? What is not to love about this iconic piece re-imagined in bean form?
Your wall has been begging for this a3 comic cover poster, even before it knew it existed.

name: Super Bean bros. 3

I was inspired by games to get into art, with that in mind this is a fitting tribute I feel. Added bonus is that anyone that loves games should love this brightly coloured a3 poster adorning their wall, a true celebration to a gaming hero.

name: queenie beanie
description:
Almost the longest reigning monarch, and quite a fabulous woman, she has lived through some major conflicts in our country and seen the world grow and evolve and change rapidly around her. She is a mark of traditional lifestyles and the glue that holds this fantastic country together. Also I am pretty sure she has never been immortalised as a bean before. For all your royalists out there - this surely is the one for you?
